Literature.Title: Rational Design of New Cyclic Analogues of the Antimicrobial Lipopeptide Tridecaptin A 1
Literature.Author: Brandelli JR, Li YX, Qian PY, Cochrane SA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli NCTC 12241(MIC=6.3µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=>50µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 9633(MIC=6.3µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii NCTC 13304(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae NCTC 5920(MIC=12.5µg/ml)
